name: Exit Bags
description: Child safe laminated bags for cannabis products.
seo_title: Cannabis Exit Bags | Custom Sizes | Wholesale
seo_description: Fully affordable customizable exit bags for cannabis flower and edibles. Customization options including shape, size, color, labelling and printing.
first_description: Designed as an extra layer of protection and discretion for products with non-child-resistant packaging.
second_description: Customization options including size, colour, logo branding and printing let you transform the exit bags to fit your brand.
third_description: Our affordable price packages make the exit bags a safe, cost-effective solution for products with non-child-resistant packaging.
